name: Delivery.boy
description:
You're a robot. A pizza delivery robot. You're running out of power.

Deliver a pizza but watch your battery!

You're running out of power. You must be fast enough to collect batteries, otherwise, you'll die.

The game is pretty short, but I hope it's difficult enough to hold you for a while. You can collect batteries in order to reach the destination. 

The game was developed for Ludum Dare 39 in 72 hours.
